name: Spin Out (Thomas Novosel)
description:
SPIN OUT

Collect coins at high speeds for points. Hit the flags to keep playing and reset the clock. The faster you go, the higher the points for each pickup.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys (left and right) - turning
  • Arrow Keys (up) - speed up
  • Space Bar - brakes

Full screen:

  • click fullscreen button
  • CTRL + to zoom in to fill the screen with the game
